title: Bzzap!

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Swarm**: Astrally send your bees to help a player, their ability will rampage, affecting visitors of their targets today.
- **Flitter** (1x, Day/Night): Instantly fly away from the town, you will leave the game for the next 2 days and nights.
- **Sweet Honey** (2x): Give a player a 1-tier defense boost and roleblock immunity, usable when dead or during **Flitter**.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **Swarm** will fail if you pick a teammate using an attacking ability.
- Once you come back from **Flitter**, you may instantly sting and poison a player, they will die on the next night unless protected by an ability, they are privately notified.

desc:
Post 4648
*"Bzzap! are a race of gigantic humanoid bees with antennas, wings and a big sting too! they can summon smaller bees to aid them in combat and their stinger can poison enemies."*
